about_us.title: Who we are?
about_us.content: adve.space is an independent outdoor advertising monitoring platform, created for advertisers, agencies, and anyone interested in the world of outdoor advertising. We aim to make the outdoor advertising market more transparent and accessible by providing up-to-date and detailed data on advertising campaigns nationwide.

our_values.title: Our values
our_values.accuracy_text: Continuously updated database on creatives, structures, and campaigns.
our_values.independence_text: We are a neutral platform focused solely on providing quality analytics.
our_values.innovation_text: We use modern technologies to analyze and visualize data.
